img_summary: The image shows a decorative object resembling a gourd or vase with a double-bulb shape. The object has a reddish-brown color with white, intricate patterns resembling vines or branches wrapping around its surface. The top of the object features a red, flower-like structure. The background is dark and blurred, suggesting a focus on the object itself.
